profile:
Our main focus is replacing "CONCRETE DRIVEWAYS" and "GARAGE FLOORS".

That's why our company name is CONCRETE REPLACEMENT EXPERTS. We specialize in one particular part of the concrete industry and try to keep that as our unique niche.

We will consider light industrial flat work that is similar in nature.


THINGS WE DO NOT DO

Sorry but we do not build foundations, retaining walls, do crack repair, or lift driveways we only replace them.
products: "CONCRETE DRIVEWAYS" and "GARAGE FLOORS" replacements are our main focus.
services:
"CONCRETE DRIVEWAYS" and "GARAGE FLOORS" replacements are our main focus, and we also do some light commercial flat work.
As we are in the concrete business and seal all new concrete we have started another division specializing in HOT pressure washing and re-sealing of existing concrete.
All concrete get recycled, never to the landfill. Services include concrete delivery, pumping, cutting, sealing, recycling, etc.
specialities:
Our main focus is replacing "CONCRETE DRIVEWAYS" and "GARAGE FLOORS" and light commercial flatwork.


We start with impeccable ground preparation, install the raw materials at a higher than industry standard, then finish the final product properly: Smooth and level without any puddles.

And we do it quickly and at a price that’s affordable and acceptable to the typical home owner.

AND A GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
name: Concrete Replacement Experts Inc.

profile:
We Do It All
OAC Construction is a growing and progressive company that provides concrete, asphalt, excavation, landscaping, snow-removal and spring clean up services. We serve industrial, commercial, municipal and residential communities in Edmonton and surrounding areas. 

Working Together
We offer an end-to-end client experience with seamless communication while providing prompt, quality work that you can count on everytime. 

Why Choose Us?
With 15 years experience behind us, OAC Construction is growing successfully by building a solid reputation for providing timely, quality service while maintaining a high standard of safety for customers, tenants, and employees. Contact us today!
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

profile:
WE’VE EARNED A REPUTATION FOR EXCELLENCE
Our family-owned business opened its doors over 20 years ago. Since then, we have built a reputation for genuinely caring about what our customers want and have enjoyed a large amount of referral business based on recommendations from past satisfied customers. We strive to provide the best quality and to achieve the highest possible level of customer satisfaction with every job we do.

All of our work comes with a one-year warranty, and our service phone line is open 24 hours, so you can reach us anytime – day or night.

NO MESS LEFT AFTER WE’VE GONE
When you hire The Best in the West Concrete Ltd., we guarantee you will receive quality workmanship and that our job site will always be clean coming in and going out. Your satisfaction with the services we provide is our top priority.

Give us a call today at 780-446-2198 to discuss your concrete and excavating needs.
services:
The Best in the West Concrete Ltd. has been servicing Edmonton and the surrounding areas since 1990. We are the number one choice for all your concrete needs. We deal in any kind of concrete removal. Plus, our professional technicians install concrete in the forms of:
Floors
Driveways
Parking Lots
Patios
In addition to our concrete pouring services, our experienced and highly trained crews offer excavation, hauling and removing, and conveying sand and gravel.
specialities:
The Best in the West Concrete Ltd. is committed to providing honest, professional, quality service. We specialize in the residential and commercial:

Conveying of sand and gravel
 
Breaking, hauling and removal of concrete
 
Supplying decorative and coloured concrete work
 
Stamping concrete
 
Providing bobcat services
name: Best in the West Concrete Inc
